/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees on both sides, their leaves forming a natural canopy overhead. Power lines crisscross above, tracing the path of electricity in the city. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Cars parked along the side of the road add a touch of modern life to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting light and shadows that play on the buildings and trees. The image is a snapshot of urban life in Beijing, capturing the blend of nature and architecture that characterizes the city.
